title: C.J. in a Pickle
description: Sometimes it is hard to tell the truth, especially when you don't like the consequences. Join CJ as he has to make the difficult decision to tell the truth, even though the consequence for lying is really 'gross.' Can a friendly elephant convince him to do the right thing, or will he keep telling outrageous lies to get out of it all? CJ in a Pickle will make you think about the right thing to do, even if you have to eat pickles!
author: Robert Bauer
